code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{TextField,Button,MenuItem,Box,Typography,FormControl,InputLabel,Select,Checkbox,ListItemText,OutlinedInput,Chip}from"@mui/material";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const courses=["JavaScript","React","Node.js","CSS","Python","HTML","C#",".NET"];const UserForm=_ref=>{let{refresh}=_ref;const[user,setUser]=useState({username:"",courses:[]});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setUser(prev=>({...prev,[name]:typeof value==="string"?value.split(","):value}));};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await fetch(`${process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL}/api/users`,{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(user)});setUser({username:"",courses:[]});refresh();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",gutterBottom:true,children:"Add User"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{width:"300px"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{fullWidth:true,label:"Username",name:"username",value:user.username,onChange:handleChange,margin:"normal"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(FormControl,{fullWidth:true,margin:"normal",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputLabel,{children:"Courses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Select,{multiple:true,name:"courses",value:user.courses,onChange:handleChange,input:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OutlinedInput,{label:"Courses"}),renderValue:selected=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{display:"flex",flexWrap:"wrap",gap:0.5},children:selected.map(value=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Chip,{label:value,color:"primary"},value))}),children:courses.map(course=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MenuItem,{value:course,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Checkbox,{checked:user.courses.indexOf(course)>-1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:course})]},course))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{width:"300px",mt:2},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleSubmit,variant:"contained",fullWidth:true,children:"Submit"})})]});};export default UserForm;
